TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit FontWeight extends System.ValueType implements class System.IFormattable

summary.span: 以筆劃輕重表示字樣密度。

span.span: Refers to the density of a typeface, in terms of the lightness or heaviness of the strokes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 加權的差異是通常由提高的筆劃或區分所關聯之指定字元的字樣，相較於 「 正常 」 的字元從該相同的字體粗細。Weight differences are generally differentiated by an increased stroke or thickness that is associated with a given character in a typeface, as compared to a "normal" character from that same typeface. **請注意**並非所有的權數可供所有的字樣。**Note** Not all weights are available for all typefaces. 無法使用字樣加權時，會傳回最接近的相符加權。When a weight is not available for a typeface, the closest matching weight is returned. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *fontWeightsValue**fontWeightsValue* A屬性名稱，例如"Light"、"Normal"或"UltraBold"。A property name, such as "Light", "Normal", or "UltraBold". ## Examples 在下列程式碼範例中，設為"UltraBold"。In the following code example, the is set to "UltraBold". [!code-xaml[FontSnippets#FontSnippet12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#fontsnippet12)]

span.span: When the value is greater than zero, it indicates that is greater than .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 淺色字型加權會小於較重的字型粗細。Lighter font weights are lesser than heavier font weights. 例如，"Light"或"Normal"字型粗細小於"UltraBold"字型粗細。For example, a "Light" or "Normal" font weight is lesser than an "UltraBold" font weight. ## Examples 在下列程式碼範例中，方法用來評估兩個物件。In the following code example, the method is used to evaluate two objects.
